actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Air Force to convey certain real property of the United States to the city of Niceville, Fla., for use as a cemetery.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey without consideration designated lands in Elgin Air Force Base to the city of Niceville, Florida, for use as nonprofit cemetery.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Air Force to convey certain real property of the United States to the city of Niceville, Fla., for use as a cemetery.
